name: Astronut (EccentRik)
description:
Astronut is a solo project I made entirely by myself in 45 DAYS!

Try and survive fighting Alien's on the Moon for as long as you can! In this simple but, addictive game!

This is my very first public & original game. I'm aware there are a few minor visual errors but I hope the game is still enjoyable.

The game can be downloaded for free but, any tips will be greatly appreciated!

How To Play

Move - A,S,W,D

Jump - J

Shoot - K
